revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Micro SIM Card slot, Bluetooth 4.0, ZigBee, CAN Bus, GPS, RTC w/ battery, 4G LTE modem, PoE in, temperature sensor, pressure sensor, accelerometer, heatsink, metal case |addchip = TPM;Nuvoton;NPCT650TB1YX;;1;,,, Pressure Sensor;STMicro;LPS22HB;;1;,,, GNSS Module;u-blox;UBX-M8030-KT;;1;,,, 3-Axis Accelerometer;STMicro;LNG2DMTR;;1;,,, 802.15.4 Zigbee Module;Silicon Labs;ETRX3587HR;;1;,,, Relative Humidity & Temperature Sensor;STMicro;HTS221;;1;,,, Programmable Multi-Channel PMIC for Intel;Renesas;P9145;;1;,,, Galvanically Isolated High Speed CAN Transceiver;NXP;TJA1052i;;1;,,, Remote & Local Temperature Sensor w/ SMBus Serial IF;GMT;G781;;1;,,, DC In Half-Pitch Phototransistor Optocoupler;Avago Tech;ACPL-217;;3;,,, 35A, 150V N-Channel Shielded Gate MOSFET;On Semi;FDMS86200;;2;,,, 18A, 100V N-Channel Shielded Gate MOSFET;On Semi;FDMC86102L;;1;,,, 6A, 5.5V On-Resistance Load Switch w/ Control Turn On;TI;TPS22958;;1;,,, 6A, 5.7V On-Resistance Load Dual-Channel Switch;TI;TPS22976;;3;,,, 150mA, 36V Ultralow-Noise Positive Linear Regulator;TI;TPS7A49;;1;,,, SDIO Port Expander w/ Voltage-Level Translation;TI;TXS02612;;1;,,, 3A, 3-6V Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54318;;1;,,, 802.3 PoE Interface & Converter Controller;TI;TPS23753A;;1;,,, 15A, 100V P-Channel MOSFET;On Semi;FDMC86139P;;1;,,, 2.1MHz 250uA Low-Power Timer;TI;TLC555;;1;,,, 6A Distributed Power Unit;Renesas;P9148;;3; |802dot11_protocols = bgn

|wi2_if_name = |rad2mod = Sierra Wireless AirPrime HL7588 |rad2modif = Mini PCIe |rad2chip1 = Intel;; |rad2chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2stand = LTE
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview==
{{See also|Redpine Signals|Sierra Wireless}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] E3805 @1.33GHz (Dual-Core) *Memory: 2GB (DDR3L) SDRAM *Storage: 16MB SPI Serial Flash, 32GB MLC NAND eMMC :TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *PCIe: 1x PCIe (used by LTE) slot *Network: 2x Fast Ethernet ports *WLAN: (802.11bgn) WiFi, LTE, ZigBee *USB: 1x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: PoE af or 12-57 VDC
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery> Dell Edge Gateway 3002 Top.jpeg|Board Top Dell Edge Gateway 3002 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
